Package commandLineApp

Class FarmManager

java.lang.Object
commandLineApp.FarmManager
public class FarmManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class manages the game logic of the Farm in the farm simulator.
Version:
22 May 2020.
Author:
Hayley Krippner, Michelle Muchemwa

    Constructors

  • Constructor Details

    • FarmManager

      public FarmManager​(GameManager gameManager, MainMenuManager mainMenuManager)
      This method creates a FarmManger. It manages the Farm view options, FarmCropActionsManager, FarmAnimalActionsManager, FarmLandActionsManager.
      Parameters:
      gameManager - The central game controller.
      mainMenuManager - The manager of the MainManager

      public java.lang.Boolean checkHaveEnoughActions()
      This method checks to see if the user has enough actions to perform another action.
      Returns:
      hasEnoughActions If th user has more than 0 actions.
